name: A Way to Gain Relevancy
description:
A silly rpg game that we poured over 200 hours of our lives into, hope you give it a try! What was supposed to be a simple scouting mission reveals a plot to eradicate all humans and bring memes back to life.

We got:

- Logan Pauls forehead

- Discord Rich Presence

- Extensive lore

We got our own soundtrack!

You can check it out by playing the game or here:

https://soundcloud.com/dawkyy/sets/a-way-to-gain-relevancy-ost

Darky · A Way to Gain Relevancy - OST

How to download:

To download and play the game you can either get it from our launcher or use the zip file which contains the game. If you do choose the launcher you will recieve updates whenever we make any to the game and you'll also be able to play any of our future projects through it.

(Lunacher requires .NET Core, if you don't have it the launcher itself will point you in the right direction but if you want to get it beforehand just go here:  64-bit ver, 32-bit ver)

Join our discord!
